roleset_name: to cheat, trick out of something

roles.descr: Theme, money or possession being taken through trickery
roles.descr_trans: 通过欺骗手段夺取主题、金钱或财产

roles.descr: Entity tricked, person/source of thing taken
roles.descr_trans: 实体被欺骗，人/物来源被盗

roleset_name_trans: 欺骗，可能会不顾一切地去做某事
